tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN Despite) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS media) (POS 's)) (NNS attempts) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB drive) (NP (PRP him)) (PRT (RP out))))))) (, ,) (NP (NNP Hillis)) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (DT the) (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ talented)) (NN player)) (PP (IN on) (NP (NN offence))))) (. .)))
